commentator_response: The 2024 Singapore Grand Prix is underway under the neon lights of Marina Bay. Verstappen starts from pole with Norris alongside in second. Alonso in fifth continues to defy time and history. Gasly and Sainz battle for position in the midfield. Hamilton and Russell aim to challenge the Red Bull dominance. With high-speed straights and tight corners awaiting, every lap will be a test of nerve. Expect drama, overtakes, and a legendary night in the city-state.

Albon surges through the field with precision, now back in P8 after a masterclass in overtaking. Tsunoda fights hard, climbing to P10, while Perez and Ocon exchange positions. Leclerc slips to P15 but remains a threat. Expect more chaos as the midfield scrapes for every position under the city lights.

Alonso is on a mission now slicing through the field like a blade. From P7 he’s already passed nine cars and closing on the top ten. Sainz and Tsunoda are locked in a fierce battle ahead. Gasly and Ocon trade positions in the midfield. Leclerc struggling but never out of it. Watch for the next overtake as the pack tightens under the neon glow.

Leclerc is a storm through the field now P8 after a masterful charge. Tsunoda surges to P10, Sainz close behind. Perez and Ocon battle for position in the top 10. Albon fights back to P14. Expect more chaos as the midfield tightens under the city lights.

Verstappen leads but Norris is on his tail with a clean line. Alonso surges into P3, closing on Norris. Leclerc attacks from P8, targeting Sainz. Gasly and Ocon trade blows in the midfield. Watch for a snap overtake at Turn 14 as the pack snakes through the city lights.

Magnussen surges into P14, overtaking Albon with a bold move on the back straight. Ricciardo follows, snatching P16 from Gasly in a tight inside pass. The midfield war intensifies as Albon fights back, while Magnussen looks set to challenge for points. Expect more fireworks in the next few laps.

Verstappen holds the lead but Norris is breathing down his neck, tyres smoking on the high-speed turns. Alonso surges into P2, now just half a second behind Norris. Leclerc attacks Sainz at Turn 14 in a hammer blow of a pass. The top 5 is a blur of neon and danger. Next lap could decide the race.

PIASTRI snakes past HULKENBERG for P5 with a late inside move at Turn 10. RICCIARDO strikes back, overtaking ALBON for P15 with a daring dive down the apron. The midfield war heats up as both men push for points. Next lap could see another shuffle at the back of the top 10.

Perez snatches P11 from Sainz in a blistering move down the back straight. Sainz fights back, but Perez holds his line. Watch for the next overtake as the midfield tightens and the battle for points rages under the neon glow.

Albon fights back, overtaking Ricciardo for P15 in a bold move on the apron. Ricciardo now P16, but still within striking distance. Albon’s resurgence continues as he targets the top 15. Watch for a snap overtake at Turn 14 as the midfield scrapes for every point under the city lights.

Perez snatches P10 from Tsunoda in a lightning strike down the back straight. Tsunoda fights back but Perez holds his line. The midfield war rages as Albon charges toward the top 15. Watch for a snap overtake at Turn 14 as the pack snakes through the neon glow.

Verstappen clings to the lead as Norris presses hard, tyres screaming on the abrasive track. Alonso on fresh rubber surges into P1, now duelling with Norris for the lead. Leclerc attacks Sainz at Turn 14 in a jaw-dropping overtake. The top 5 is a rollercoaster of neon and noise. Next lap could deliver the first major shock.

Verstappen fights for grip as Norris presses hard on the brakes. Alonso surges ahead with a flawless overtake at Turn 14. Leclerc now P3, Sainz reeling. Watch the inside line at Turn 1 — a hammer blow could crown a new leader. The city lights blaze as the top five blur into chaos.
